summary: This document is an email from Jes Staley to Jeffrey Epstein, inquiring about a woman assisting Sarkozy. It highlights the communication between Staley, a CEO at JPMorgan, and Epstein, indicating a personal or professional connection.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is identified as the Chief Executive Officer of the Investment Bank at JPMorgan, reaching out to Epstein for information.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the recipient of the email, indicating his involvement in discussions with Staley.

connections.description: Staley, as CEO of JPMorgan, is communicating with Epstein, suggesting a professional relationship.

keyFacts: Jes Staley is the Chief Executive Officer of the Investment Bank at JPMorgan.
The email was sent on December 16, 2010.
Staley is inquiring about a woman helping Sarkozy, indicating a potential interest in political connections.
The email suggests a professional relationship between Staley and Epstein.
